name: n8ao
description: An efficient and visually pleasing implementation of SSAO with an emphasis on temporal stability and artist control.

scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache && parcel build src/N8AOPass.js && cp dist/N8AO.js example/N8AO.js && cp dist/N8AO.js.map example/N8AO.js.map && cp dist/N8AO.js example_postprocessing/N8AO.js && cp dist/N8AO.js.map example_postprocessing/N8AO.js.map
